physical_examinations.changes_over_time: HR increased to 120-130 during ED stay; desaturation to 85% on room air, improved with BiPAP.

relevant_findings.general: Sleepy but arousable, does not answer questions, grimaces when abdomen is palpated.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Mildly distended, TTP in RUQ with guarding, no rebound tenderness, no palpable mass.

relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, MMM, oropharynx clear, EOMI, PERRL.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD.
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema.
